wikipedia_page.main: Anthony Henry (born 26 November 1957) is an English association football administrator and former footballer who played in the Football League for Bolton Wanderers, Manchester City, Oldham Athletic, Shrewsbury Town and Stoke City.

link_mentions.page: List of foreign J1 League players
List of Bolton Wanderers F.C. seasons

response: Anthony or Tony Henry is the name of:
*Tony Henry (footballer, born 1957), retired English midfielder who played for Bolton Wanderers, Manchester City, Oldham Athletic, Shrewsbury Town and Stoke City
*Tony Henry (footballer, born 1979), retired English defender who played for West Ham United and Lincoln City
*Tony Henry (drummer), Australian drummer of The Cockroaches
